website_summaries.verdict: The Sugarpine II Air Mesh from Ahnu is a mix of good and bad points. Its casual look and spacious forefoot seem to win the approval of outdoor lovers. However, the reported drawbacks, such as blister-causing friction and poor quality, are not something that can be set aside. By and large, with these presented pros and cons, getting a pair of Ahnu Sugarpine II Air Mesh might require a bit of careful consideration.
pros: Based on a majority of customer reviews, the Ahnu Sugarpine II Air Mesh is indeed a lightweight hiker
Plenty of wearers with foot conditions like comfortable capsulitis and plantar fasciitis find this shoe very comfortable
Its roomy toe box has been appreciated by a lot of wearers
A considerable number of users mention that this Ahnu product offers ample arch support
The casual and low-profile look of the Sugarpine II Air Mesh has delighted several lady hikers
cons: According to some disappointed brand loyalists, it is not as durable as the original Sugarpine Air Mesh
Hordes of frustrated female purchasers have noticed that the stitching on its upper is substandard

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable except back of ankle
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe, however, the back of the shoe is really stiff and not flexible and rubs against the back of the ankle. I tried to soften it a bit, but it is pretty stiff. The shoe is light and VERY comfortable with the exception of the back that rubs against the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Janie M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for hiking and everyday.
customer_reviews.text: My current foot issue- capsulitis - Is much better thanks to these shoes and some inserts. They have been my go to shoe for the summer. These worked great for hiking at Yosemite and Sequoia National Parks. They clean up nicely. I have multiple colors- each great. I am 60+ years young and I bought 1/2 size up for extra toe box room for my issue. They fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: flowerlover5

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I struggle with plantar fasciitis and the footbed is so comfortable. Used them for four days of aggressive hiking in the Great Smoky Mountains with no pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shoes ! Just Love Them !
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful shoes. They fit well, are very comfortable and great for really long walks. I have just purchased my second pair. I put over 600 miles on my first pair and only now have to replace them because the soles are wearing thin. But the rest of the shoe is holding up great. And in the winter my feet never get cold in them . They are very cozy in cold weather but not uncomfortable in hot weather. Sorta like MAGIC ! And they are very light weight so it doesn't feel like you are dragging weights around on your feet. I highly recommend them for anyone who loves to walk long distances every day.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie J. Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Taken these on a couple hikes. I really like the toe box which is wider than the average athletic shoe. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: sunburywhite

customer_reviews.title: great so far
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits true to size ; I am usually a size 8 and this is spot on. The shoe is nice and light weight but supportive. good tread on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald E.

customer_reviews.title: Fit is great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sneakers. I also own their yoga sneaker in white and they too fit great, look great and get me through whatever activity.
customer_reviews.author: SmileAccount

customer_reviews.title: I like Ahnus
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes, I wear them to exercise and for every day. I was glad to find this grey mist pair on line for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe over all
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these shoes for the most part. They fit well, are comfortable and lightweight which I love. The only complaint is the back of the shoe fits too snug, which caused blisters the first time I wore them. Now that they are worn in a bit it's better but that sucked first time wearing them. If not for that I would have given these 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bthomas

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable and look nice
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Ahnu shoes and they are both extremely comfortable. And they manage to look a cut above the average sneaker. They are nice looking and I always get compliments on the shoes and wonder where I got them. I'm a big fan and encourage these for good, everyday, comfortable footwear.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Pare

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too hard & uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute & fit true to size. Unfortunately the back of shoe heal & sides of toe box are super hard & press uncomfortably on my feet. I wore these to work a couple days hoping to break them in & ended up killing my feet.
customer_reviews.author: 🐈💕

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, perfect fit, sturdy, breathable, perfect shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I just opened my package and tried on my new shoes. They exceed my expectations 10 fold! They are comfortable, fit well, are sturdy yet breathable and I am so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: K. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, & great support.
customer_reviews.text: Even though it’s so light weight, the support is fabulous. Even in the arch. Much impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Baum

customer_reviews.title: Color not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about the shoe except the color is not at all what the picture shows. Picture shows tan mesh with green sides and the entire shoe is green.
customer_reviews.author: Lettuce

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are some of the best I've ever bought. I have a wider toe box and these fit my feet beautifully. Put them on and go no break in spots.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very comfortable. Good quality shoes. The olive color is nice. I received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight hiking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a pair of Ahnu hikers, whether shoes or boots, that I did not love. Very comfortable from right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: V. Nagle

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: was a b-day gift for the wife. She loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Billy S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the olive green color.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Ahnu’s. My husband and I hike many terrains and these shoes are great.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Bartz

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased wide width & there is plenty of room in the toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Vanderlee

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Shoes Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my second pair of these shoes! Very happy to find these after spending the past year wearing these almost every day. Very comfortable for my achy unhappy feet & worked really great for my high arches. These are the best shoes I’ve ever owned — since they are wearing down on the heel, it’s time to replace them. Very happy to find these again - I almost bought an extra pair!
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: ankle problem
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe, but the back of the shoe, at the ankle, is quite stiff and gave me blisters at first . I wear it with 2 pairs of socks now that they are brok bit more aen in, and it's fine. I would not buy at again, however, because of the ankle thing.
customer_reviews.author: Wellwellwell

product_meta.title: Ahnu Women's W Sugarpine Ii Air Mesh Hiking Boot
product_meta.description: A sleek, sporty take on the tried-and-true Sugarpine hiking boot, the Sugarpine II Air Mesh takes to spontaneous adventure with ease. Part of the Ahnu by Teva collection, this versatile low top features the super-surefooted performance of Ahnu Numentum® Hike technology.
feature_bullets: Breathable mesh upper keeps your feet cool and comfortable.
Aegis Antimicrobial construction sheds bacteria, grit and grime to keep things fresh.
Custom Vibram Outsole provides optimal traction in a variety of environments
Weight: 10.5oz per shoe based on a women’s size 40
